column4: I have a pcchip MB wita a LAN - VIA VT6103 10/100Mbps Fast Ethernet PHY
it should be automatic, if the chip is enabled.
when you lspci, does it show up?
it looks like it is working.
i see the other computer but no files
so you're trying to share files with windows?
so you're trying to use the machine with the VIA chip as a file server?
i just want it tobe part of my home network
i think it is installed this is super ubuntu
i can see even windows machines
then you need to read about configuring samba.  The network is working, but the server has to be set up and told what shares to make available and who has permission to view them.
Appears to be nothing to worry about.  https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/samba/+bug/24741
